Package gobblin.data.management.copy

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CopyableDataset
    Dataset that supports finding CopyableFiles.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CloseableFsCopySource
    Used instead of CopySource for FileSystems that need be closed after use E.g SftpLightWeightFileSystem.
    CopyableDatasetMetadata
    A CopyableDataset that is used to serialize into state objects.
    CopyableFile
    Abstraction for a file to copy from CopyableFile.origin to CopyableFile.destination.
    CopyableGlobDatasetFinder
    ConfigurableGlobDatasetFinder that returns datasets of type RecursiveCopyableDataset.N
    CopySource
    Source that generates work units from CopyableDatasets.
    FileAwareInputStream
    A wrapper to FSDataInputStream that represents an entity to be copied.
    OwnerAndPermission
    Wrapper for owner, group, and permission of a path.
    RecursiveCopyableDataset
    Implementation of CopyableDataset that creates a CopyableFile for every file that is a descendant if the root directory.
    SinglePartitionCopyableDataset
    An implementation of CopyableDataset that partitions all files into a single partition
